content:
Adding indie and alternative tracks can definitely give your playlist a unique flavor.

Now, about tracking your jog with Rachel, there are many excellent running apps that can help you do just that. Here are some popular ones:

1. **Strava**: A highly-rated app that tracks your runs, rides, and other activities. It provides detailed statistics, including distance, pace, elevation gain, and calories burned. You can also compete with friends, join challenges, and explore new routes. (Free, with premium features)
2. **Nike Run Club**: A popular app that tracks your runs, provides audio cues, and offers personalized coaching. It also has a social feature to connect with friends and join challenges. (Free)
3. **Runkeeper**: A user-friendly app that tracks your runs, sets goals, and provides audio cues. It also integrates with many wearable devices and offers personalized training plans. (Free, with premium features)
4. **MapMyRun**: A comprehensive app that tracks your runs, provides route maps, and offers audio cues. It also has a large community of users, allowing you to connect with friends and join challenges. (Free, with premium features)
5. **Garmin Connect**: A great option if you have a Garmin wearable device. It tracks your runs, provides detailed statistics, and offers personalized coaching. (Free, with premium features)
6. **Fitbit Coach**: A personalized fitness app that offers customized running plans, audio cues, and tracks your progress. It integrates seamlessly with Fitbit wearable devices. (Free, with premium features)
7. **Runtastic**: A feature-rich app that tracks your runs, provides audio cues, and offers personalized coaching. It also has a large community of users and integrates with many wearable devices. (Free, with premium features)

These apps are all available for both iOS and Android devices. You can try out a few to see which one works best for you and Rachel.

Some features to consider when choosing a running app:

* GPS tracking and route mapping
* Audio cues and voice feedback
* Personalized coaching and training plans
* Social features to connect with friends and join challenges
* Integration with wearable devices
* Detailed statistics and progress tracking
* Customizable goals and reminders

Have fun exploring these options, and happy jogging with Rachel!
